attributes.action: Require all new houses to be built with solar water heating or ground pump heating, by default.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of installing these items to a new home is trivial compared to the cost of a home, yet the benefits to the home-buyer in terms of future expense, and the benefits to the environment are huge. WE're building a 100,000 new houses - let's not make that 100,000 new gas boilers.
